thread.title: BRIEF-Black Knight Announces Secondary Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Black Knight Announces Secondary Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-black knight announces secondary offering of common stock reute

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Black Knight Inc:
* BLACK KNIGHT ANNOUNCES SECONDARY OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK AND REPURCHASE OF COMMON STOCK
* BLACK KNIGHT SAYS INTEND TO OFFER FOR SALE 5 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK
* BLACK KNIGHT INC - ‍INTENDS TO FUND SHARE REPURCHASE WITH BORROWINGS UNDER ITS REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY​
* BLACK KNIGHT INC - ‍SELLING SHAREHOLDER WILL RECEIVE ALL OF NET PROCEEDS FROM THIS OFFERING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
